message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but $120 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $135. I'm willing to go up to $125. Can we meet in the middle again?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $130. This is as low as I can go, but I think it's a fair price for this amazing product. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $127.50. Can we meet at this price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit short, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $128. This is the lowest price I can accept, but I think it's a fair price for this amazing product. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $128. I'm willing to go up to $126.50. Can we meet at this price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $127. This is the lowest price I can accept, and I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not reach an agreement. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $127, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $125.50. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
